original_title: Curious George Takes a Vacation & Discovers New Things
overview: Curious George loves to travel, and no matter where he goes, adventure is always waiting for him. And he's sharing it with you in a new collection of shows from his Daytime Emmy(R)-nominated hit PBS KIDS(R) TV series. Go exploring with George, from the tip-top of the big top to deep under the sea, in "Curious George Takes a Vacation and Discovers New Things!".
title: Curious George Takes a Vacation & Discovers New Things
